038c0066e235445a84153e8c9c450522.name: PeasantJournal
038c0066e235445a84153e8c9c450522.description: A blank journal enchanted by Arkanos. It automatically inscribes everything its bearer senses, so there is no need to put pen to paper. It is passed on to new peasants by the canary along with the goldsack. This way peasants can know what their predecessors witnessed, and maybe not share in their fate.

5997e537696249d2b4a4f4923eaf1f1e.name: BasicBombs
5997e537696249d2b4a4f4923eaf1f1e.description: There is a warning label affixed to the bottom that reads, "Use under adult supervision."
5997e537696249d2b4a4f4923eaf1f1e.effect: Deals damage and destroys rocks, as well as other objects

fd134fd7009445e78e01661d2dc582b9.name: SagittaBuff
fd134fd7009445e78e01661d2dc582b9.description: A drawn arrow holds the energy to destroy its target. Guide it.
fd134fd7009445e78e01661d2dc582b9.effect: Enemies explode in arrows after a critical strike

9bd05ba36666459dae1c6d859f88d722.name: AraBuff
9bd05ba36666459dae1c6d859f88d722.description: Also known as "The Altar." This constellation protects against bad omens, for a while.
9bd05ba36666459dae1c6d859f88d722.effect: Consumes a future curse after praying

bd847ee2c55444f1a3736b83c65d4b53.name: CanisMajorBuff
bd847ee2c55444f1a3736b83c65d4b53.description: The dogs of dogs. Strong, loyal, and above all else, fierce.

555eebcb91dd42bc8aef0c1e22e6bcfa.name: UrsaMajorBuff
555eebcb91dd42bc8aef0c1e22e6bcfa.description: Consume now, for the winter is long and the landscape desolate.
555eebcb91dd42bc8aef0c1e22e6bcfa.effect: Increases max health after eating food

b0840502088a4087b27e621c60fd808e.name: CurseEater
b0840502088a4087b27e621c60fd808e.effect: Removes a curse after defeating enemies and stores it for later.

f33ee3e24f3e4aae86541892a84a6fd3.name: Radiance
f33ee3e24f3e4aae86541892a84a6fd3.effect: Whenever the Phoenix heals the peasant it applies an immolation effect that burns nearby enemies

fa316b4c8f0143a78721a4de9582f428.name: Rebirth
fa316b4c8f0143a78721a4de9582f428.effect: The Phoenix will resurrect the peasant once when they fall

ae28d25e777c4a3798a06ef08270a933.name: CrystalFire
ae28d25e777c4a3798a06ef08270a933.description: Named after the legendary fire lord, this rare rock is extremely hot to the touch.

db74061ad7994cfe81f8bd40d276b544.name: CrystalLightning
db74061ad7994cfe81f8bd40d276b544.description: Originally discovered by the geologist Moog, who was later able to synthesize it using custom built tools.

5475a92bea384938b654c9aa6a2e0fd1.name: MapDungeonWarp
5475a92bea384938b654c9aa6a2e0fd1.description: Located at the bottom of the goldmine is a secret entrance to the dungeon of Delvemore Castle. This is the only entrance, and it has been assigned Guard Captain Toadvine and his partner, the priest Bathcat, as its guards. Many criminals from throughout the kingdom are locked away in the dungeon. For especially dangerous criminals, or those that commit acts that particularly upset the king, special subfloor cells have been constructed.
5475a92bea384938b654c9aa6a2e0fd1.effect: Unlocks fast travel to The Delvemore Dungeon

c3eb2253994547fc9daed50ba6100add.name: MapHallWarp
c3eb2253994547fc9daed50ba6100add.description: The haunted halls have served many purposes and many masters over the centuries. They were originally built as a mausoleum for the royal family. Centuries later, and long after the royal family changed over, mages and alchemists setup libraries and labs. They had been run aground for their twisted ideas and propensity for the dark arts. Now the halls are home to no one, other than the twisted creations of blasphemers.
c3eb2253994547fc9daed50ba6100add.effect: Unlocks fast travel to The Halls of Din

93bd86b718e74b02b7ec0d847c4a3f96.name: MapCavernWarp
93bd86b718e74b02b7ec0d847c4a3f96.description: Beyond the Halls of Din are the Shimmering Caverns, a labyrinth of bright crystal and sparkling sand. The caverns have seen very little human activity, but there are remnants of some civilization, long dead, or long left. After some study, it seems the sand in the caverns may be the remnants of Scales, pulverized over the centuries into shimmering dust.
93bd86b718e74b02b7ec0d847c4a3f96.effect: Unlocks fast travel to The Shimmering Caverns

44fb9ed14905472ba6e2e9bd2c28c840.name: MapCoreWarp
44fb9ed14905472ba6e2e9bd2c28c840.description: The Golden Core has been a source of mystery for all of recorded history. Many expeditions of brave adventurers have been sent off to explore it, but none return. Its dangers are countless. The heat is intense, the creatures are aggressive and deadly, and it is as deep as the Undermine goes. At least, as far as anyone knows.
44fb9ed14905472ba6e2e9bd2c28c840.effect: Unlocks fast travel to The Golden Core

dda07778dd344b97a662927089fcaf67.name: CircinusBuff
dda07778dd344b97a662927089fcaf67.description: An explorer's tool that reveals any and all secrets.
dda07778dd344b97a662927089fcaf67.effect: Temporarily reveals secret rooms, secret rooms can have secret rooms

3771da94280f49959634ebc9bc7098a4.name: HealthS
3771da94280f49959634ebc9bc7098a4.description: "Only a heathen would order meat well done." - Griswold, The Collector
3771da94280f49959634ebc9bc7098a4.effect: Restores a small amount of health

6e754dce0fcb4e14bc31cdedd7d322ad.name: HealthSCooked
6e754dce0fcb4e14bc31cdedd7d322ad.effect: Restores a small amount of health

5d1d5865fd7b4353b3b43fe0d81b7960.name: HealthM
5d1d5865fd7b4353b3b43fe0d81b7960.description: A food imported from a far away island of paradise.
5d1d5865fd7b4353b3b43fe0d81b7960.effect: Restores a moderate amount of health

602fe3bfe34a4405afb54189d6790b6b.name: HealthMCooked
602fe3bfe34a4405afb54189d6790b6b.desription: Some call it burned, others call it caramelized.
602fe3bfe34a4405afb54189d6790b6b.effect: Restores a moderate amount of health

e218308da36941de8705ba950e0455f3.name: HealthL
e218308da36941de8705ba950e0455f3.description: Meat from a wall always tastes better than meat you have to earn yourself.
e218308da36941de8705ba950e0455f3.effect: Restores a large amount of health

2d68178db5d0482c8919cc676f87a57c.name: HealthLCooked
2d68178db5d0482c8919cc676f87a57c.description: Roasted to perfection. First verbally, and then physically.
2d68178db5d0482c8919cc676f87a57c.effect: Restores a large amount of health

c82f660a0fbd4eb983e98d5896253e09.name: Key
c82f660a0fbd4eb983e98d5896253e09.description: Inscribed with the crest of the Kingdom of Delvemore: a rampant liger.
c82f660a0fbd4eb983e98d5896253e09.effect: Unlocks chests, doors and other locked objects

8d0acbcdb33a46a9bfa9c623e8be72e6.name: Bomb
8d0acbcdb33a46a9bfa9c623e8be72e6.description: There is a warning label affixed to the bottom that reads, "Use under adult supervision."
8d0acbcdb33a46a9bfa9c623e8be72e6.effect: Deals damage and destroys rocks, as well as other objects

0f53c763ed3b4c77bceaa4853f95ead0.name: BombBag
0f53c763ed3b4c77bceaa4853f95ead0.description: A well worn bag, full of bombs, and covered in black powder.

dd61c0367bbf41f9bb86a85c1e7b0aae.name: Talisman
dd61c0367bbf41f9bb86a85c1e7b0aae.description: A blessed trinket that wards off spirits, demons, and other nasty things.

c0ee06997e624cd88c68171930159fa1.name: ArmorShard
c0ee06997e624cd88c68171930159fa1.description: "Just a few hundred more of these bad boys and you'll have a real piece of armor." - Wayland, the Blacksmith

f3c6fcf6f86a44178c4649f71fb5d18f.name: TincturePotion
f3c6fcf6f86a44178c4649f71fb5d18f.description: Made from dissolving ground, dried canaba leaf in alcohol.

27b4611c53e04c0a9d771b76d47d7deb.name: ApprenticesTincturePotion
27b4611c53e04c0a9d771b76d47d7deb.description: A healing potion created by an apprentice who hasn't quite perfected their craft.
27b4611c53e04c0a9d771b76d47d7deb.effect: Recovers a random amount of health

cea67360abf84347a264ef64ed806e58.name: SalvagingSludgePotion
cea67360abf84347a264ef64ed806e58.description: The liquid moves slowly. Often requiring a knife be inserted into the bottle to get things moving.
cea67360abf84347a264ef64ed806e58.effect: Recover health for each carried curse

bfe7c47be6fc4bdbb86e364a6b1cf076.name: RegenPotion
bfe7c47be6fc4bdbb86e364a6b1cf076.description: "You want to make sure your troll is hydrated if you're to extract the good stuff." - Dirk, the Alchemist

d2c408e370584302b135fc159d6b0b25.name: GhostlyIchorPotion
d2c408e370584302b135fc159d6b0b25.description: Scentless fumes arise from the liquid, rejuvenating tired bones.
d2c408e370584302b135fc159d6b0b25.effect: Heal over time for each curse

db3a699d040b4fd6a4a64399f1275d61.name: CureAllPotion
db3a699d040b4fd6a4a64399f1275d61.description: "You get healed, and you get healed... you all get healed!" - Black Rabbit

a3f7691e471243ed899c52b5ae1bc2de.name: CoffeePotion
a3f7691e471243ed899c52b5ae1bc2de.description: Peasants often drink something called miner's coffee. Brewed in a process you don't want to know.
a3f7691e471243ed899c52b5ae1bc2de.effect: Recover health proportional to missing health

f84e9f7aa7b04c648a08c6b75eebaf2e.name: ElixirPotion
f84e9f7aa7b04c648a08c6b75eebaf2e.description: A potion of such extreme value that they are often hoarded and never used.

27497c3cdd91494ba066eb45ee59d528.name: PartyPopcornPotion
27497c3cdd91494ba066eb45ee59d528.description: These kernels are ready to party.
27497c3cdd91494ba066eb45ee59d528.effect: Duplicate almost everything in the room

0455a3d8711146e3a479e71d4d37954b.name: GoldPopcornPotion
0455a3d8711146e3a479e71d4d37954b.description: A vial of golden popcorn kernels. They vibrate with anticipation.
0455a3d8711146e3a479e71d4d37954b.effect: Duplicate all gold in the room

dc421ae2fb974a01b8cc4b2a9093244e.name: ItemPopcornPotion
dc421ae2fb974a01b8cc4b2a9093244e.description: A vial of popcorn kernels. They vibrate with anticipation.
dc421ae2fb974a01b8cc4b2a9093244e.effect: Duplicate all basic items in the room

908bacbc988a46559da7ef9f4fe8e042.name: FoodPopcornPotion
908bacbc988a46559da7ef9f4fe8e042.description: A vial of well seasoned popcorn kernels. They vibrate with anticipation.
908bacbc988a46559da7ef9f4fe8e042.effect: Duplicate all food in the room

5638e38a67e04f4eaec6473d5042890f.name: WhiplashPotion
5638e38a67e04f4eaec6473d5042890f.description: Wrix developed a potion that matches one's throwing form perfectly with that of the goblin bat riders of Urr.

fb789e8f36a349f1a71ceb2e9c1e3f46.name: StrengthPotion
fb789e8f36a349f1a71ceb2e9c1e3f46.description: Developed by the goblin alchemist Wrix who studied and was inspired by the strength of the feral orcs.

5178abb3de614cb59411b8144fd2dc32.name: SavagryPotion
5178abb3de614cb59411b8144fd2dc32.description: There is no secret to this potion. It is simply orc blood, extracted while under the influence of bloodlust. That doesn't make it easy to come by though.

00772a2e1a7d4755a76e8183b1d6b0ce.name: AlacrityPotion
00772a2e1a7d4755a76e8183b1d6b0ce.description: Some say that the origins of this potion lead back to a goblin alchemist and that the recipe was stolen by the human kingdom of Delvemore.

44cd9c54d22c4ab289b5edf7b4fe40f4.name: CleaveSerumPotion
44cd9c54d22c4ab289b5edf7b4fe40f4.description: A common potion found in goblin logging camps.

fe0fbfc6bceb4a2f91ea280ba82f7d38.name: GustSerumPotion
fe0fbfc6bceb4a2f91ea280ba82f7d38.description: The brewing process begins with capturing a powerful gust of wind from atop Mt. Thessal.

617b7758377d4230a24823645d3898f4.name: HealthSerumPotion
617b7758377d4230a24823645d3898f4.description: The first, unrefined versions were made by coastal trolls that would mix crushed turtle shells with their own blood.

df251e38396f44119823faa3840db809.name: DecursePotion
df251e38396f44119823faa3840db809.description: Apothecaries often overcharge for holy water knowing they have the market cornered.

e99410fecfac4015b5504ec3b87b5cd0.name: PurgePotion
e99410fecfac4015b5504ec3b87b5cd0.description: Sometimes the good must suffer in order for evil to be purged from the world.
e99410fecfac4015b5504ec3b87b5cd0.effect: Removes a curse and deals 75 damage.

2d9d51a29ebe40a99d37445de1954951.name: PurificationPotion
2d9d51a29ebe40a99d37445de1954951.description: To obtain absolution, one must purge themselves of all worldly attachments.
2d9d51a29ebe40a99d37445de1954951.effect: Removes all curses, bombs, keys, and sets health to 1

7ca4f0f6567c4b348fd6ccae072dbded.name: Aether
7ca4f0f6567c4b348fd6ccae072dbded.description: An exceptionally hard to find potion, as there is only a single alchemist in the kingdom that knows its recipe.

28737e052b414273a67aca33267fc2e7.name: Absolution
28737e052b414273a67aca33267fc2e7.description: A powerful potion that works under oddly specific conditions.
28737e052b414273a67aca33267fc2e7.effect: If you have exactly 5 curses, removes 5 curses

b0dd99d6f5184fb49df441af4bf298a5.name: BombDoublingPotion
b0dd99d6f5184fb49df441af4bf298a5.description: A farmhouse style brew, with a clean taste and low alcohol content. Served as a clean source of hydration for peasants.

f34771cdd3514f379f42355fb1b4a41d.name: SwapPotion
f34771cdd3514f379f42355fb1b4a41d.description: "I'm not sure if it actually changes your items, or if it just messes you up so bad you think it did." - Dirk, The Alchemist

20d260544d224607b1f2363d06def2a0.name: IronGlazePotion
20d260544d224607b1f2363d06def2a0.description: Instantly reacts with iron, making it pliable without increasing its temperature.
20d260544d224607b1f2363d06def2a0.effect: Average the number of held keys and bombs

2caf27e525fa4787bd629282ef202094.name: HolyGlaze
2caf27e525fa4787bd629282ef202094.description: Peasants that don't diversify their skill sets often end up terminated. Killed that is.
2caf27e525fa4787bd629282ef202094.effect: Average the levels of all blessings

15ca0afa442849328a5a8ff6411b301a.name: AmbrosiaPotion
15ca0afa442849328a5a8ff6411b301a.description: Actually a very secular drink, made with blended grass and orange juice.
15ca0afa442849328a5a8ff6411b301a.effect: Double the level of a random blessing

87304ff317824d638d8c2a591b5ce37b.name: NitroglycerinPotion
87304ff317824d638d8c2a591b5ce37b.description: Ultra miniaturization and rapid enlargement are two critical fields of study in alchemy. They are both taught at the Arcane Sanctum.

1c0df4b6c9f2494c8eb2376ec97ca4fb.name: AuglycerinPotion
1c0df4b6c9f2494c8eb2376ec97ca4fb.description: This potion was created at the request of a very wealthy lord who wanted to hide his vast fortune.

4673c7f91a7b4d35b8ebe30a16ce650a.name: ImmolatePotion
4673c7f91a7b4d35b8ebe30a16ce650a.description: Douse yourself in a living flame that only has hunger for your enemies.

d42df1015fa04546bfd1cc0958cfc34b.name: FloatPotion
d42df1015fa04546bfd1cc0958cfc34b.description: Warning: Make sure to be on firm ground when the effects wear off.

b994f67a8e3f44578e1899cd043e3997.name: SeltsBlood
b994f67a8e3f44578e1899cd043e3997.description: A drop of Selt's blood was used to synthesize a potion that can replicate her reproductive capabilities.

0b736c7fe4974e65a08cd5c0ab189929.name: BloodChalice
0b736c7fe4974e65a08cd5c0ab189929.description: A golden goblet with flecks of crimson. It rewards those willing to pay a sacrifice.
0b736c7fe4974e65a08cd5c0ab189929.effect: Consumes 25% health, drops items and sometimes another blood chalice.

12784fa0c4a949fdadf21288bc5ec170.name: FireballPotion
12784fa0c4a949fdadf21288bc5ec170.description: Peering into the bottle reveals a vortex of fireballs, writhing in furor.

5f8cb66127e74d0baff7a1ba5b4cf972.name: ReverseDamagePotion
5f8cb66127e74d0baff7a1ba5b4cf972.description: The most brutal axe cleave becomes a soothing bath of vitality in what can only be described as magic.
5f8cb66127e74d0baff7a1ba5b4cf972.effect: The next time you would take damage, gain that much health instead

05572761ed6d4d4f91203cd46f890adf.name: PickledPilferPotion
05572761ed6d4d4f91203cd46f890adf.description: A bottle containing one Hoarding Pilfer, dozens of axe pomels, and countless smooth rocks.

bcfda0149d944afcb246305be2695172.name: ShopPotion
bcfda0149d944afcb246305be2695172.description: Miniature wizards miniaturized a shop and put it in a regular sized bottle.

f83096ef1b674f6c832dec65a4a3d758.name: PotionPotion
f83096ef1b674f6c832dec65a4a3d758.description: Made by an artisan with a good sense of irony.

15c7f082e7454fc38695e6152782bbf9.name: ChestInABottle
15c7f082e7454fc38695e6152782bbf9.description: A big fad during the Enlightenment was to have a replica chest in a bottle on your bookshelf.

cda68d3762ef4aa6bc5b00e2f8eeec6d.name: TransmuterInABottle
cda68d3762ef4aa6bc5b00e2f8eeec6d.description: "Miniaturization technology and transmutation technology? What a time to be alive." -- Unknown Alchemist
cda68d3762ef4aa6bc5b00e2f8eeec6d.effect: Add a TRANSMUT3 to the room

f05bebbd21e04c468299c7763704f332.name: AltarInABottle
f05bebbd21e04c468299c7763704f332.description: Traveling monks often carried these in case they had to perform an emergency blessing.

b12beb42d1b549e392b00d00a01520c9.name: Transmutagen
b12beb42d1b549e392b00d00a01520c9.description: It's unclear whether we will ever learn the secret of this ooze.
b12beb42d1b549e392b00d00a01520c9.effect: Transforms all relics in the room

a72e7b460e8649b08298d8c4bf15f349.name: SwapRelicPotion
a72e7b460e8649b08298d8c4bf15f349.description: Dropping any object into this shifting liquid will quickly mutate it into something familiar but different.

06eea0e248e74a249d1fe9b3c92d0b70.name: SwapAllRelicPotion
06eea0e248e74a249d1fe9b3c92d0b70.description: The Metamorphim change is a five step process. Mighty Metamorphim combines those into a single, more efficient process.

8a91e7875f294cb280f34898b5594f2d.name: CircleTransmutePotion
8a91e7875f294cb280f34898b5594f2d.description: Bends matter in a small area, but the process is increadibly strenuous.
8a91e7875f294cb280f34898b5594f2d.effect: Transmutes items in a small circle, but makes them fragile

200012b4fdb74289b228f292193cf146.name: UnholyStrengthPotion
200012b4fdb74289b228f292193cf146.description: A brew that stirs the drinker into a ferocious rage, making them dangerous to their enemies and themselves.

b9c7849437254fcbbe60ab61143f1de5.name: GhostPepperSauce
b9c7849437254fcbbe60ab61143f1de5.description: Protects against physical burns, but not emotional ones.
b9c7849437254fcbbe60ab61143f1de5.effect: Become immune to fire damage and ignite yourself

9c0401cc3c9a4188a6b3c800215b557d.name: NumbingCream
9c0401cc3c9a4188a6b3c800215b557d.description: Particularly useful after a hard day in the goldmine, or during a hard day in the goldmine.

e50bae2f580c4159a881f6c7852ca586.name: EagleEyePotion
e50bae2f580c4159a881f6c7852ca586.description: Nicknamed the "peeper's potion" for obvious reasons.

8372b8d3152445afa410b7bb9dbd45a8.name: PotionofPlenty
8372b8d3152445afa410b7bb9dbd45a8.description: "Be prepared for any situation." - Norin, the Responsible

84e344cdca10420a9db29efbd3d1dc72.name: ProteinPotion
84e344cdca10420a9db29efbd3d1dc72.description: It's not so much about bulking up, it's more about surviving winter.

a716c2ee1f634d74af7cc84ff341d374.name: BlessedBlend
a716c2ee1f634d74af7cc84ff341d374.description: Carried by the priests of the sanctum, just in case.

4bbe9f7680b34a17a1ca6dfc90c725e7.name: ToxinPotion
4bbe9f7680b34a17a1ca6dfc90c725e7.description: A thick, black oil consisting of venom from the kingdom's deadliest creatures. This poison acts quickly, reducing movement and inflicting pain.

c0a32814b2e24d15a63664bcdc949d26.name: WitchsBrew
c0a32814b2e24d15a63664bcdc949d26.description: Baba, during her apprenticeship, accidentally brewed this cursed potion. She tried to bury her shame, but it refused to remain hidden.

145bde979116479fabc648bebf584e32.name: FreeloaderPotion
145bde979116479fabc648bebf584e32.description: "You can't always get what you want. But if you try sometimes, you might just find, you get it for free." - Proverb

6a41bdb034dd45549825a7b4f9198362.name: BiscuitsPotion
6a41bdb034dd45549825a7b4f9198362.description: Beltrame, as part of her apprenticeship, developed a treat loved by all small creatures
6a41bdb034dd45549825a7b4f9198362.effect: Increse experience gain for a familiar.

17392f3e7d05485a800ddcd201bfb98c.name: MidasTouchPotion
17392f3e7d05485a800ddcd201bfb98c.description: A label affixed to the bottom reads: "Warning: Do not ingest."
17392f3e7d05485a800ddcd201bfb98c.effect: All enemies are turned to gold

4f9154518bfe4a0ebd09e57aef8ebdf9.name: KissSuccubusPotion
4f9154518bfe4a0ebd09e57aef8ebdf9.description: Made with the blood of a succubus, which is incredibly hard to come by.
4f9154518bfe4a0ebd09e57aef8ebdf9.effect: Kill all enemies and steal their health

5829b0cc3f6149da9649aa302cf7ca57.name: AllPotion
5829b0cc3f6149da9649aa302cf7ca57.description: Dirk's crowning achievement as an alchemist. A potion so powerful the recipe needed to be divided amongst laboratories to keep it hidden.
5829b0cc3f6149da9649aa302cf7ca57.effect: Is whatever you need it to be

1cfe53e981a24b7cbbad91669f5ac52e.name: StarlightSip
1cfe53e981a24b7cbbad91669f5ac52e.description: A stern warning adorns the bottle: "More than a sip may cause extinction!"
1cfe53e981a24b7cbbad91669f5ac52e.effect: Pull the heavens down onto your foes

43f16c0b6aa94743a87c235025a7f98d.name: ChurchbellNectarPotion
43f16c0b6aa94743a87c235025a7f98d.description: An aromatic oil that wards off harm in small doses.

4c8d7e3454124c4aab32c45bf05edc8b.name: PangolinPotion
4c8d7e3454124c4aab32c45bf05edc8b.description: In case of imminent danger curl up and form a ball. Step two, roll on away from that danger.

4f2ebf67c2ab4103bba07ae33f8fce10.name: Canary
4f2ebf67c2ab4103bba07ae33f8fce10.description: In a weird change of pace, this canary seems to outlive the miners it works with.

42c02406d29049eba350c408a44bd699.name: Djinn
42c02406d29049eba350c408a44bd699.description: Djinn are creatures that make the clouds their home. They are highly intelligent and have a devious sense of humor.
42c02406d29049eba350c408a44bd699.effect: A cunning ally that sees through deception

31d2663fef3248c8af2d6727453a83ef.name: Firebird
31d2663fef3248c8af2d6727453a83ef.description: A legendary bird, worshiped as a demigod in the deserts to the far east.

e6bc0264d4e14cdc866c93bfe318195e.name: Monkey
e6bc0264d4e14cdc866c93bfe318195e.description: Was once a pet to Baba. Nikko escaped, and it is rumored he has been plotting his revenge ever since.

f85e0301401b414b811f17c6a84506d2.name: Phoenix
f85e0301401b414b811f17c6a84506d2.description: An ancient creature that performs a cycle of rebirth once every hundred years.

966adf72347c4f35bf9f3789d6b7ee18.name: Sylph
966adf72347c4f35bf9f3789d6b7ee18.description: Sylphs are elusive creatures. It is rumored that they commune with the gods.

25cb114d9617483a8be3c9c7ddb8ee39.name: Spirit
25cb114d9617483a8be3c9c7ddb8ee39.description: A tormented spirit that was found haunting a cask of wine.

839ad2905954481cb294f4b6cd01ff34.name: Thunderbird
839ad2905954481cb294f4b6cd01ff34.description: During the rainy season, Thunderbirds bring storms to the highland plateau.

9d1c4ac6c24f4dfdb29a48457c1c49e6.name: Chaos
9d1c4ac6c24f4dfdb29a48457c1c49e6.description: Chaos Spawn do not care for order. They have only one allegiance, and that is to entropy.
9d1c4ac6c24f4dfdb29a48457c1c49e6.effect: A child of the god Arengee

97b65bd7fb0e420e87e88345312624c5.name: Eidolon
97b65bd7fb0e420e87e88345312624c5.description: One of many fallen soldiers that have not yet made peace. It dawns the same armor it wore in life.

157bcafd3635443485e1676d182197b9.name: Lesser_demon
157bcafd3635443485e1676d182197b9.description: Lesser demons lack the immense power of their greater cousins, but don't make the mistake of thinking they're toothless.

1981b4af04434077afafc78691056387.name: WaylandsBoots
1981b4af04434077afafc78691056387.description: Steel-toed and steel-soled, not to be confused with Toadvine, the Steel-Souled Steel-Toad.

25a2fe2d57a34b6598d34cbbb58fdeb0.name: Galoshes
25a2fe2d57a34b6598d34cbbb58fdeb0.description: The first galoshes were just two oil jumpers strapped to your feet.

d2b0fec2b4cf44e8aa63b0aa94441fd5.name: FloatBoots
d2b0fec2b4cf44e8aa63b0aa94441fd5.description: Walking out onto the abyss can be fairly disconcerting at first. It's fairly disconcerting the hundredth time too.

7ee59f418896447ca03ce09665771ae6.name: LavaWalkers
7ee59f418896447ca03ce09665771ae6.description: Wayland was asked to equip an expedition of peasants sent to the Golden Core. They didn't survive, but the boots did.

a7ae4ce21346402ca6fe2ad0c09b1c14.name: HeliosBoots
a7ae4ce21346402ca6fe2ad0c09b1c14.description: You might as well be walkin' on the sun.
a7ae4ce21346402ca6fe2ad0c09b1c14.effect: Fire patches last for much longer and deal more damage

fe3880cccffb46a6ba510453822df02b.name: ButchersCleaver
fe3880cccffb46a6ba510453822df02b.description: Once belonged to the King's personal butcher. Pudge was ejected from the Kingdom when he developed a taste for the flesh of the dead.
fe3880cccffb46a6ba510453822df02b.effect: Sometimes drop meat from your enemies

637c8bf20a8d4e6da5bcd6bbbac68f12.name: KeyBlade
637c8bf20a8d4e6da5bcd6bbbac68f12.description: A sword in the shape of a dull key. Not practical as a key or a blade.
637c8bf20a8d4e6da5bcd6bbbac68f12.effect: Increases swing damage for each key you have

9919d2d2d31941f2a96f898d56e8d297.name: LegendaryBlade
9919d2d2d31941f2a96f898d56e8d297.description: Only worthy champions can find their way through the foggy woods where this weapon rests.

49e257bc3ed04cde9e5b0a7089d7af10.name: Mjolnir
49e257bc3ed04cde9e5b0a7089d7af10.description: A hammer comprised entirely of thorium grants the power and wrath of the gods.
49e257bc3ed04cde9e5b0a7089d7af10.effect: Summon lightning when the pickaxe is caught

212720105e1a4605b4d5bc4295a684cd.name: DoomBlade
212720105e1a4605b4d5bc4295a684cd.description: Sword of the greater demon Zodd. It only grants its power to cursed individuals.
212720105e1a4605b4d5bc4295a684cd.effect: Gain damage for each carried curse

2d5d75f5824242b781e8295d5f25b996.name: BattleAxe
2d5d75f5824242b781e8295d5f25b996.description: A common weapon in the Orcish army. Basic, but to the point.
2d5d75f5824242b781e8295d5f25b996.effect: Increases swing size, but slightly decreases swing damage

2e1f6f7792eb4409a359778402737ed1.name: Glaive
2e1f6f7792eb4409a359778402737ed1.description: Elven riders go into battle on large cats. The glaive is their prefered weapon.
2e1f6f7792eb4409a359778402737ed1.effect: Increases throw size, but slightly decreases throw damage

05ad55b489ff4af28e34ab471ecd0640.name: Masa
05ad55b489ff4af28e34ab471ecd0640.description: A short blade of legend, wielded by the brother. What it lacked in reach, it made up for in power.
05ad55b489ff4af28e34ab471ecd0640.effect: Reduces throw damage and increases swing damage

78d8214111974925b1e2039f20b728cf.name: Mune
78d8214111974925b1e2039f20b728cf.description: A long blade of legend, wielded by the sister. What it lacked in power, it made up for in reach.
78d8214111974925b1e2039f20b728cf.effect: Reduces swing damage and increases throw damage

c5791c753f7e42de8a2814bd4b17504a.name: Masamune
c5791c753f7e42de8a2814bd4b17504a.description: "If on your journey, you should encounter a god, a god will be cut."

f568bbf4ecb54daf9d7d472f06d97521.name: Suneater
f568bbf4ecb54daf9d7d472f06d97521.description: A legendary mace that consumes all the light around it, creating an area of perpetual darkness.
f568bbf4ecb54daf9d7d472f06d97521.effect: Consumes all current and future blessings and converts them to swing damage

e161e4e3083948eaa22f9830394b1235.name: VorpalBlade
e161e4e3083948eaa22f9830394b1235.description: The blade cuts through the air with a crack and the sound of snicker-snack.

66b7f22d45354e549d2a4a18ce9792f7.name: TwistedBlade
66b7f22d45354e549d2a4a18ce9792f7.description: A dagger with a blade curled around like a helix. Doesn't appear to be a weapon suited for combat.
66b7f22d45354e549d2a4a18ce9792f7.effect: Increases critical strike chance for each carried curse

2945df6b2ea043dd94c67ba09aefbe2b.name: ObsidianKnife
2945df6b2ea043dd94c67ba09aefbe2b.description: The sharpest blade in the known world, but also the most fragile.
2945df6b2ea043dd94c67ba09aefbe2b.effect: Dramatically increases damage, but breaks when hit

54d1936d55494194a42d56c6f314c763.name: DirksHammer
54d1936d55494194a42d56c6f314c763.description: Get what you want through ingenuity, or sheer brute force.
54d1936d55494194a42d56c6f314c763.effect: Transmute an item by hitting it

a8d3215241a94555866450ab791bc7e3.name: Resurrection
a8d3215241a94555866450ab791bc7e3.description: To be blessed by Din is to have deep pockets or know someone who does.

623c929400f44c05b07827fef3426e60.name: GordonsTunic
623c929400f44c05b07827fef3426e60.description: This tunic protected the alchemist Gordon during the catastrophe at the far away Black Mesa laboratory.

b367a2746211405a8dda8d560f88b6d3.name: Breastplate
b367a2746211405a8dda8d560f88b6d3.description: Comes with complimentary breastplate stretcher for the more rotund wearer.
b367a2746211405a8dda8d560f88b6d3.effect: Adds a point of armor to the health bar

53f62e71c29143f79a27abca6069f52b.name: Pauldron
53f62e71c29143f79a27abca6069f52b.description: It's common knowledge that the larger the shoulder pads, the more experience the warrior.
53f62e71c29143f79a27abca6069f52b.effect: Adds a point of armor to the health bar

2f342d2da24340b383d49f1fb9374e5a.name: Gauntlets
2f342d2da24340b383d49f1fb9374e5a.description: It is very difficult to wield a sword, or any other weapons without fingers.
2f342d2da24340b383d49f1fb9374e5a.effect: Adds a point of armor to the health bar

e930152d55884ffbb8a0ce9edd6a46f1.name: Greaves
e930152d55884ffbb8a0ce9edd6a46f1.description: They won't make you lightning fast, but they will help when you drop a hammer on your foot.
e930152d55884ffbb8a0ce9edd6a46f1.effect: Adds a point of armor to the health bar

19dc5130b5404db7a09262d609d9b8ba.name: ShieldofQuills
19dc5130b5404db7a09262d609d9b8ba.description: Barbarians lack defensive discipline, but they make up for it with offensive prowess.
19dc5130b5404db7a09262d609d9b8ba.effect: Gain two points of armor, armor increases damage

630bd51306d34a9c9de7b041f1a3caee.name: BlastSuit
630bd51306d34a9c9de7b041f1a3caee.description: A ridiculous suit of armor that looks reminiscent of an onion.
630bd51306d34a9c9de7b041f1a3caee.effect: Invulnerability to friendly bomb blasts and increases bomb damage

ca4e94bdc2cc43329474ef40230aca52.name: Pillow
ca4e94bdc2cc43329474ef40230aca52.description: Just an ordinary sleeping pillow, yellowed from years of drool marks.

a1ca0abb4f8c47bbb719be48fb7fd470.name: SoulGuard
a1ca0abb4f8c47bbb719be48fb7fd470.description: A powerful defensive option that wears on the soul.
a1ca0abb4f8c47bbb719be48fb7fd470.effect: Reduces and redirects damage to your max HP

2a64aa4851c94841ae297322646e6bdc.name: WetBlanket
2a64aa4851c94841ae297322646e6bdc.description: Mining near the Golden Core required fire safety such as this blanket. Not a great sleep aid.
2a64aa4851c94841ae297322646e6bdc.effect: Puts out fires immediately, but requires water charges

95c9369deaba40caa44b1b48989a6a17.name: WarPaint
95c9369deaba40caa44b1b48989a6a17.description: Intimidate your enemies with dark lines and blacked out eye sockets. Or maybe just some cute whiskers?
95c9369deaba40caa44b1b48989a6a17.effect: Increase attack damage and speed when killing enemies

fd702e9d2662490f886876ee598b15d7.name: Battlestandard
fd702e9d2662490f886876ee598b15d7.description: Even peasants can intimidate their enemies with the correct livery.
fd702e9d2662490f886876ee598b15d7.effect: Increases move, attack, and throw speed at the beginning of battle

6bbe9142f1144e7cac6b0f2edf13cac9.name: Catalyst
6bbe9142f1144e7cac6b0f2edf13cac9.description: A strange stone that radiates warmth and a sense of comfort.

ecb92c9f921647a69fa3bcd95bb535e7.name: SeltsEgg
ecb92c9f921647a69fa3bcd95bb535e7.description: Ejected from Selt's dying body, this egg continues to produce her spawn.

5482a1b1b71b433d886865f2394f2fcc.name: ElectrifiedOrb
5482a1b1b71b433d886865f2394f2fcc.description: The orb has no preference on its owner. Its only desire is to orbit something.
5482a1b1b71b433d886865f2394f2fcc.effect: Orbits the peasant and shocks enemies on contact

cd5580348c4d4a3cbcba94eafc169f4a.name: OthermineConduit
cd5580348c4d4a3cbcba94eafc169f4a.description: Relics that communicate with the Othermine are rare and mystify even the most learned scholars of the land.
cd5580348c4d4a3cbcba94eafc169f4a.effect: Ghastly hands will attack the enemy

ca58b2a9d6cc4f56ae0699e33578a2e2.name: Doll
ca58b2a9d6cc4f56ae0699e33578a2e2.description: Placed in the beds of young children to protect them from the horrors of the night.

d21a2fe3ce9d4fddb34a59dd4df3773f.name: Devotion
d21a2fe3ce9d4fddb34a59dd4df3773f.description: Din is a god of gifts, but requires loyalty from his subjects.

4b36bbc087004750a1526304aef7b088.name: 108Beads
4b36bbc087004750a1526304aef7b088.effect: Heal when praying at an altar

80242154d4284cc6aab221292cb0ae93.name: HolyGuacamole
80242154d4284cc6aab221292cb0ae93.description: "The most sacred food item is the avocado. The second most is the lime." - Griswold, The Collector

d8f7d033bec0417ab0b553f3a51a9a7f.name: SewingKit
d8f7d033bec0417ab0b553f3a51a9a7f.description: The best investment for the future is a needle and some thread.
d8f7d033bec0417ab0b553f3a51a9a7f.effect: Keep all your gold when you die

b29ea427f7f64aa3a06c8e19a0495648.name: SimpleChest
b29ea427f7f64aa3a06c8e19a0495648.description: Just an ordinary chest used to deliver items.

074da99ced7f4993b38cb90df3a27d84.name: MealTicket
074da99ced7f4993b38cb90df3a27d84.description: Illegible due to indiscernible scribbles, but has a crude drawing of a sandwich.
074da99ced7f4993b38cb90df3a27d84.effect: Free food at the shop, right now!

6774d4be9573481f8e6fa97add614285.name: AdventurersHat
6774d4be9573481f8e6fa97add614285.description: Suitable attire for spelunking in dank caverns, exploring dusty tombs, and that's about it...

376feb7893994baf826df320010a2eae.name: AdventurersWhip
376feb7893994baf826df320010a2eae.description: A whip is an impractical weapon. For example, it often hits enemies behind you as often as it does in front.

bc3b600bea3d416391e2549c137fff63.name: GoldenIdol
bc3b600bea3d416391e2549c137fff63.description: A golden idol of the god Din. Probably belongs in a museum.
bc3b600bea3d416391e2549c137fff63.effect: Discover more rooms and get rich

d6045725bae4407ea8492ff1e4fa7c3f.name: TotemOfLife
d6045725bae4407ea8492ff1e4fa7c3f.description: A totem depicting an ancient god of life and the natural order.

fe3df61649f84dd2b08492c1788d92af.name: AphoticCharm
fe3df61649f84dd2b08492c1788d92af.description: In the darkness there is light.
fe3df61649f84dd2b08492c1788d92af.effect: Heal in each new room for each curse

2380817a345d4458b5630768a38f35a1.name: DillonsClaw
2380817a345d4458b5630768a38f35a1.description: This insatiable and eager beast approaches with distinct and distributing fuss.
2380817a345d4458b5630768a38f35a1.effect: Deal even more damage when you critical strike

6910c28b900043d48911f9ae27e343cf.name: ShadowsFang
6910c28b900043d48911f9ae27e343cf.description: A brindled and dark beast. Perfect camouflage for stalking the periphery of your vision.

815f242a079240b8833a32c5f408e03a.name: BrambleVest
815f242a079240b8833a32c5f408e03a.description: The barbs are sharp and cruel. They dig into flesh and cloth alike.

be05dceb707e415ca9224898a15bd1d3.name: Duplicator
be05dceb707e415ca9224898a15bd1d3.description: It's quite easy to make two of something. You first take one of something, then you double it.
be05dceb707e415ca9224898a15bd1d3.effect: Relic rooms present a tantalizing choice

87447b9566774ef486aa065a51a2bf4e.name: Hyperstone
87447b9566774ef486aa065a51a2bf4e.description: The stone vibrates at such a frequency as to be mildly annoying.

262277e1e3914d1aae80a2d9f5acb3bd.name: MinersFlask
262277e1e3914d1aae80a2d9f5acb3bd.description: A sneaky little vessel with something left over for the new owner.
262277e1e3914d1aae80a2d9f5acb3bd.effect: Feel the effects of a potion for longer

1e47701bb3324ddfb2c097dda2506453.name: Lunchbox
1e47701bb3324ddfb2c097dda2506453.description: The best time of day is midday when the pickaxes are down and the sandwiches are up.
1e47701bb3324ddfb2c097dda2506453.effect: Store a piece of food for later

2725a7b0032447a98b7604d29395317a.name: Immolate
2725a7b0032447a98b7604d29395317a.description: An ember, kicked from a bonfire in the depths of the UnderMine.

70965440d15240d1a7ac7c8ddff4c9b2.name: ItemPopcorn
70965440d15240d1a7ac7c8ddff4c9b2.description: An ordinary kernel of corn, enchanted by a wizard who thought it would be a fun party trick.

6b18a3a60fe342f1833aff1526898e11.name: GoldPopcorn
6b18a3a60fe342f1833aff1526898e11.description: The wizard enchanted a second kernel, this one just slightly more golden in color.

81b81569168949aeaea9412aea00601d.name: FoodPopcorn
81b81569168949aeaea9412aea00601d.description: A third enchanted kernel, dusted ever so gently in cayenne, salt, and black pepper.

ebb2f31ddd77460196d44fabcd18f57a.name: PocketGrill
ebb2f31ddd77460196d44fabcd18f57a.description: A cooking grill, miniaturized by a wizard that enjoyed backpacking in The Enchantments.

6851f6a8812f4bcbabaa9a2414ec70d5.name: Leftovers
6851f6a8812f4bcbabaa9a2414ec70d5.description: "Food in a chest is downright normal compared to storing a turkey in the wall." - Dungeon Chef
6851f6a8812f4bcbabaa9a2414ec70d5.effect: Find old, gross food in chests

ed388fc9c09943bc987cf1c3388e8755.name: SpareOrdinance
ed388fc9c09943bc987cf1c3388e8755.description: Normally it's unwise to use old, unstable explosives found in long forgotten chests. Normally.
ed388fc9c09943bc987cf1c3388e8755.effect: Discover a bomb in every chest

f7eca5455bdf49fe9d2dafd4ec32d1e7.name: Miniaturizer
f7eca5455bdf49fe9d2dafd4ec32d1e7.description: Several years ago there was a craze in the wizarding community to make tiny versions of everything. It has since gone out of style.
f7eca5455bdf49fe9d2dafd4ec32d1e7.effect: Find small boxes in big boxes

5abbafb002b04ee495f179afdb550ffa.name: KeyDoubler
5abbafb002b04ee495f179afdb550ffa.description: "Yes sir! This little doozy will copy any key you need." - Dibble, the Merchant
5abbafb002b04ee495f179afdb550ffa.effect: Sometimes drop a new key when using an old key

e56c7298c19e47d990140eceb14b95cc.name: BombDoubler
e56c7298c19e47d990140eceb14b95cc.description: In a parallel universe, somebody is missing a lot of bombs.
e56c7298c19e47d990140eceb14b95cc.effect: Sometimes drop a new bomb when using an old bomb

fb374cc41c744cdbbbe227889cf001c4.name: DoubleDoubler
fb374cc41c744cdbbbe227889cf001c4.description: When a single single isn't enough.
fb374cc41c744cdbbbe227889cf001c4.effect: Chance to drop a key and bomb when using either

ec20d69533674c59a1af67db438bf172.name: PilfersGift
ec20d69533674c59a1af67db438bf172.description: "I'm still not sure what these pilfers are up to, but hooboy, two relics!" - Black Rabbit
ec20d69533674c59a1af67db438bf172.effect: Be blessed with two gifts from the pilfers

cad1d7d1cd454671ac62d6496c5aa49e.name: GoldenBombs
cad1d7d1cd454671ac62d6496c5aa49e.description: "Any alchemist can turn lead into gold. Stone to gold is an entirely different matter." -Dirk, the alchemist.

82d1d9ec3cb74d019e07ac5750e5433d.name: ClusterBombs
82d1d9ec3cb74d019e07ac5750e5433d.description: "Bombs were losing their excitement, and then this came along." - Bishop, the Bomb Smith

04579544c0354d24a712f465b0a4a504.name: IncendiaryBombs
04579544c0354d24a712f465b0a4a504.description: Blood of the salamander. Kept only in check, by the blood of her brother.
04579544c0354d24a712f465b0a4a504.effect: Bombs explode in a shower of fire

96b62be9e4f04a329eed69ab143957aa.name: RookBombs
96b62be9e4f04a329eed69ab143957aa.description: Rook learned bomb smithing from his mother, but always had a special relationship with his father.

80c079e5b87345b28557d545c6f0131e.name: BishopBombs
80c079e5b87345b28557d545c6f0131e.description: Bishop was strong and independent. He left home at an early age after studying bomb smithing with his mother.

78622bf8ccfb4b6b8f4ad11165615e88.name: QueenBombs
78622bf8ccfb4b6b8f4ad11165615e88.description: Queen taught her sons everything she knows. but they were schooled on alternating days.

079a976e3dd24ea8819941b9f81259c2.name: TransmutagenBombs
079a976e3dd24ea8819941b9f81259c2.description: The powder has been soaked in Transmutagen, causing anything caught in the blast to be violently changed.

01dd414291604477aa1405b5683a29a3.name: BrandingBombs
01dd414291604477aa1405b5683a29a3.description: You have now been marked with the brand of sacrifice. The lives of those who bear the brand will be consumed.
01dd414291604477aa1405b5683a29a3.effect: Bombs brand enemies for sacrifice, +10 bombs

0948c27e6bf3483292c1e2e065499018.name: LightningBombs
0948c27e6bf3483292c1e2e065499018.description: Alchemists took the liquefied remains of the lightning bug and weaponized it... even more so.

5e270234064d40d08b17881eee751dfd.name: BloodBomb
5e270234064d40d08b17881eee751dfd.description: A cursed item, made with black powder and the blood of a lesser demon.
5e270234064d40d08b17881eee751dfd.effect: Leeches life from enemies slain by bombs

7a06da12309d4136917c71be7772e055.name: TsarBomba
7a06da12309d4136917c71be7772e055.description: A strange duplication device that attaches to any kind of bomb. Beware of side effects.
7a06da12309d4136917c71be7772e055.effect: Killing enemies with a bomb spawns a new bomb. Carried bombs decrease swing and throw damage.

c3cf34b72ca743f7986c53215ec3a358.name: U235
c3cf34b72ca743f7986c53215ec3a358.description: A strange, glowing rock that emits a warm and comforting aura.
c3cf34b72ca743f7986c53215ec3a358.effect: Bomb damage is proportional to the number of carried bombs, +5 bombs

3640d085d4624902a191cefbacabd840.name: GeckoBlast
3640d085d4624902a191cefbacabd840.description: Expands and then contracts the universal sticky force.

fd98fd90983c49f49e88267708a16807.name: CaptureSphere
fd98fd90983c49f49e88267708a16807.description: The lifeforce of slain enemies is converted and saved for later.
fd98fd90983c49f49e88267708a16807.effect: Bomb kills permanently increase bomb damage

a1231c3c35814d68aaae8d98cc882fd9.name: RemoteDetonator
a1231c3c35814d68aaae8d98cc882fd9.description: Provided increased safety to miners, but deemed too costly and an unnecessary expense by management.
a1231c3c35814d68aaae8d98cc882fd9.effect: Detonate bombs when you feel like it

403c20cf86844b8ba5a495752f890817.name: ShortWicks
403c20cf86844b8ba5a495752f890817.description: A bundle of wicks, all cut short by a bombardier that lived dangerously.

724a50c9ac524f9fb3f527a5052e02a6.name: Guantes
724a50c9ac524f9fb3f527a5052e02a6.description: Warm and cozy gloves that keep you separated from the chilling touch of winter.
724a50c9ac524f9fb3f527a5052e02a6.effect: Throw that pickaxe a bit harder

1808d1da72b540c1a611a560f5f89fb3.name: SequenceBreaker
1808d1da72b540c1a611a560f5f89fb3.description: A contraption that allows the wearer to skip forward in time unbeknownst to others.

67aea971b4214697bb0cf4bdc4e904aa.name: ThrowingStar
67aea971b4214697bb0cf4bdc4e904aa.description: An easily concealed weapon employed by assassins of the eastern kingdoms.
67aea971b4214697bb0cf4bdc4e904aa.effect: Thrown pickaxe penetrates enemies and objects

b4e5f598694c439d8260e8539e0320b2.name: Guidance
b4e5f598694c439d8260e8539e0320b2.description: A comforting force that ensures everything is where it needs to be.

01e0ef72372d4531a4a1cdb3cc265f97.name: PhantasmalAxe
01e0ef72372d4531a4a1cdb3cc265f97.description: The axe is voracious and aggressively seeks new blood.

830216e9492c484489ef90c303f07b68.name: Chakram
830216e9492c484489ef90c303f07b68.description: A tool that seems oddly good at cutting down trees, but what's it doing underground?
830216e9492c484489ef90c303f07b68.effect: Throw a whirling blade of death

48f2bb8ba1f742ca830edfaa91772625.name: Fork
48f2bb8ba1f742ca830edfaa91772625.description: An enchanted rune that was originally used to win trickshot competitions in the annual fair.

b6f58486915b43b8bcd0004d74f9182b.name: BottledLightning
b6f58486915b43b8bcd0004d74f9182b.description: "Bottling lightning isn't something you do twice, because it kills you." - Dirk, the Alchemist
b6f58486915b43b8bcd0004d74f9182b.effect: Chance on hit to chain lightning

efa267f58ead4081a7c8d7769a5e6bf8.name: SalamanderTail
efa267f58ead4081a7c8d7769a5e6bf8.description: Separated from the legendary creature Seer, the tail still writhes in agony.
efa267f58ead4081a7c8d7769a5e6bf8.effect: Chance on hit to ignite your enemies

aede3a51037549b9b0eeeec881d5168e.name: CripplingPoison
aede3a51037549b9b0eeeec881d5168e.description: A rare poison collected in the bogs of Moor.
aede3a51037549b9b0eeeec881d5168e.effect: Chance on hit to poison your enemies

e25c4adfa3e04022ae18673db8f83276.name: CausticVial
e25c4adfa3e04022ae18673db8f83276.description: A vile vial of liquid that rests in the pickaxe head. A mechanism injects victims upon impact.
e25c4adfa3e04022ae18673db8f83276.effect: Enemies hit with the thrown pickaxe explode on death

0c33fc50f8d94d518803789c0b7f2185.name: CrackedOrb
0c33fc50f8d94d518803789c0b7f2185.description: Pain and misery ooze from the cracks of this dark orb.

9fcfbe4652be48ec82ea6a8431a18d37.name: UrsineRing
9fcfbe4652be48ec82ea6a8431a18d37.description: "The bear is a symbol of power, strength, and overall badassery." - Toadvine, Guard Captain

29799d6270d24f018cef3d360eebc5e7.name: DemonRing
29799d6270d24f018cef3d360eebc5e7.description: A ring passed down from generation to generation until it was lost by a careless child demon.

651c313904884b19afcd5a1da136c01c.name: MediocreRing
651c313904884b19afcd5a1da136c01c.description: This ring could never decide what it wanted to be, so now it's just okay at a couple of things.

3693999de5e94fcd81b5fcd53c13e8b4.name: BerserkerPendant
3693999de5e94fcd81b5fcd53c13e8b4.description: A necklace of gnarled orc fangs, caked in blood.
3693999de5e94fcd81b5fcd53c13e8b4.effect: Deal more swing damage at low health

2fe62c4bfc084a7a8516c18f23575fb3.name: AxeThrowersPendant
2fe62c4bfc084a7a8516c18f23575fb3.description: A simple metal choker inscribed with the crest of the hill troll tribe.
2fe62c4bfc084a7a8516c18f23575fb3.effect: Deal more throw damage at low health

10444b01cc944bdc92bbc183ecfd4dfe.name: KnightPendant
10444b01cc944bdc92bbc183ecfd4dfe.description: An award for courage, and a symbol of valor.
10444b01cc944bdc92bbc183ecfd4dfe.effect: Deal more swing damage at high health

77af6531c8294f249cf55fd69c74bd8a.name: ArchersPendant
77af6531c8294f249cf55fd69c74bd8a.description: Once a year an archery tournament is held in Delvemore. This pendant is the prize.
77af6531c8294f249cf55fd69c74bd8a.effect: Deal more throw damage at high health

e790a903a95240ffa6ff75f0c17475cd.name: IronBranch
e790a903a95240ffa6ff75f0c17475cd.description: A strange branch with strange properties. For instance, planting one in the ground will grow a small tree instantaneously.
e790a903a95240ffa6ff75f0c17475cd.effect: Increase health, swing damage, and attack speed

e21cf8a29a6b4277b40ba59cb04c299b.name: CrownQueens
e21cf8a29a6b4277b40ba59cb04c299b.description: The land that is now Delvmore was once ruled by giants. The old giant king's crown was forged into two complimentary crowns for the King and Queen.
e21cf8a29a6b4277b40ba59cb04c299b.effect: Increase throw damage, swing size, and swing speed

0248a19ceeb042c096a827dbcb5b10de.name: CrownKings
0248a19ceeb042c096a827dbcb5b10de.description: While a monarchy by definition has a single ruler, the King and Queen are two halves of a whole.
0248a19ceeb042c096a827dbcb5b10de.effect: Increase swing damage, throw size, and throw speed

5efb8642758041cfb29b8555ce405f41.name: CrownEmperors
5efb8642758041cfb29b8555ce405f41.description: Kings and Queens are anointed by the divine will, but Emperors... well they are the divine will.
5efb8642758041cfb29b8555ce405f41.effect: Increases stats and receive a blessing

6e31da144f9b4820a3442e42883a52e5.name: PilferRing
6e31da144f9b4820a3442e42883a52e5.description: A token of friendship between the pilfers and peasants of Delvemore.
6e31da144f9b4820a3442e42883a52e5.effect: Soak up gold and get a discount at the shop

7c1a74b4bc5e4398b2a10459f9b50b21.name: UnstableConcoction
7c1a74b4bc5e4398b2a10459f9b50b21.description: A substance that combines with gold and force to create devastating effects.
7c1a74b4bc5e4398b2a10459f9b50b21.effect: Gold hits the floor with explosive force

9c707dd6871a44b7b7326ad378f41a38.name: GoldTooth
9c707dd6871a44b7b7326ad378f41a38.description: A morbid trinket picked off a prospector who lived way beyond his years.

ebe6a743ac76455ea4771e300ebc0b7b.name: GoldenDelicious
ebe6a743ac76455ea4771e300ebc0b7b.description: A cursed apple, turned to gold by a fool who didn't know what they were wishing for.
ebe6a743ac76455ea4771e300ebc0b7b.effect: All food is golden and extra delicious

277d2316237d49109d6d1439f7df6e14.name: Conductor
277d2316237d49109d6d1439f7df6e14.description: Created with the golden entrails of a monster whose arrogance was unbound.
277d2316237d49109d6d1439f7df6e14.effect: Electrify your enemies when picking up gold

0533edf2633049baa08a73d7ba5ef518.name: GoldFrenzy
0533edf2633049baa08a73d7ba5ef518.description: Do not underestimate the lengths one will go to to defend their fortune
0533edf2633049baa08a73d7ba5ef518.effect: Gain temporary damage when picking up gold

7c3dcc99d36d4f6f8bcc2524ecdb93e8.name: Intensifier
7c3dcc99d36d4f6f8bcc2524ecdb93e8.description: An arrogant stone that disobeys the laws of thermodynamics.

a596ffca42664024be1aeba28ad46f24.name: SkullShield
a596ffca42664024be1aeba28ad46f24.description: Skulls animated by some long dead necromancer.
a596ffca42664024be1aeba28ad46f24.effect: A shield that blocks projectiles, most of the time

23ed5e24dd3c420eacbf5c006e61be87.name: ReflectProjectiles
23ed5e24dd3c420eacbf5c006e61be87.description: "Discussions with the mirror are unwise." - Arkanos, the Archmage

db4baf760be740b99ff679a838ee3ee4.name: MirrorShield
db4baf760be740b99ff679a838ee3ee4.description: Impervious to the passage of time, this ancient aegis has survived the rise and fall of countless kingdoms.

91f466ecbb87497b943eabd77f6e4681.name: HungrySpirit
91f466ecbb87497b943eabd77f6e4681.description: The spirit of a selfish and vindictive king. He remains selfish and vindictive in death.
91f466ecbb87497b943eabd77f6e4681.effect: Leach the life of your enemies

dd44a1f545ad48cda6d653cb6b5eaafb.name: NullStone
dd44a1f545ad48cda6d653cb6b5eaafb.description: "Being invincible once in a while is better than never at all." - Proverb
dd44a1f545ad48cda6d653cb6b5eaafb.effect: Block a hit once in a while

35ccd3bee9604d10988601bfecb53a3a.name: Mushroom
35ccd3bee9604d10988601bfecb53a3a.description: When logic and proportion have fallen sloppy dead, and the white knight is talking backwards.
35ccd3bee9604d10988601bfecb53a3a.effect: Gain maximum health when killing enemies

eaf60a76dda742928cdd8f75d3e22eca.name: Clover
eaf60a76dda742928cdd8f75d3e22eca.description: Much luckier than a three leaf clover. Not nearly as lucky as a five leaf clover.
eaf60a76dda742928cdd8f75d3e22eca.effect: Hit the gold right out of your enemies' pockets

69994ce940d94e439ab01d04a9c176e7.name: Tent
69994ce940d94e439ab01d04a9c176e7.description: Sometimes, the best thing to do is just take a nap.
69994ce940d94e439ab01d04a9c176e7.effect: Adds a tent to the starting room of a floor, one use only

56fb37c63e434aa08fa3c868c3c4d9c3.name: Aegis
56fb37c63e434aa08fa3c868c3c4d9c3.description: The Knight Toadvine defended his loyal companion against orders and was subsequently demoted to Guard Captain for his disobedience.

fdf3edb47a594d0f870acabb1d82d433.name: Map
fdf3edb47a594d0f870acabb1d82d433.description: "Discover the secrets of the UnderMine!" is written in playful lettering, on the front.
fdf3edb47a594d0f870acabb1d82d433.effect: Get a peep at your surroundings

d537cbb8584b4a3fbe45f0ceef4f2ef1.name: PetrifiedRock
d537cbb8584b4a3fbe45f0ceef4f2ef1.description: Simply touching this rock makes one feel luckier.
d537cbb8584b4a3fbe45f0ceef4f2ef1.effect: Increase drop rate of items from rocks

3776afb876a74e50911b6d3080f0388d.name: RatBond
3776afb876a74e50911b6d3080f0388d.description: A token of friendship between peasant and pest.

97fbd863c09b44fa9605e675e7275f85.name: CosmicEgg
97fbd863c09b44fa9605e675e7275f85.description: An egg, rumored to exist since before creation, births and nurtures fantastic creatures
97fbd863c09b44fa9605e675e7275f85.effect: Increases experience gain for a familiar

3d321813e7904a1486d6243defa59cc3.name: BirthingPod
3d321813e7904a1486d6243defa59cc3.description: This chamber that greedily consumes any and all nearby nutrition, diverting it to the embryo inside.

898d87f98b184697ac89672f9bf955e4.name: CreditCardSilver
898d87f98b184697ac89672f9bf955e4.description: Pilfers have unusually long memories so try not to leave your debt for the next guy.

f83c843bf28e48afbb6f3aec7d5d0eed.name: CreditCardGold
f83c843bf28e48afbb6f3aec7d5d0eed.description: Not so fine print: This contract is not void in the case of death or dismemberment. Your next of kin will be responsible for repayment.

87dd4661d57b48c3812b4c962c00cc2e.name: CreditCardBlack
87dd4661d57b48c3812b4c962c00cc2e.description: For prefered customers who have proven to have upstanding credit.

189b6fc98b1849ea848523610481af7d.name: ButchersClover
189b6fc98b1849ea848523610481af7d.description: Much luckier than a Four Leaf Clover. Much deadlier too.
189b6fc98b1849ea848523610481af7d.effect: Sometimes drop golden meat from your enemies

f3973f00fda94bfbb4eed373ed28b775.name: RabbitGloves
f3973f00fda94bfbb4eed373ed28b775.description: "Who pilfers the pilfers? I do." - Black Rabbit
f3973f00fda94bfbb4eed373ed28b775.effect: Get a free item in every shop

4202645d8fa34a97a70ded11ee0f8f31.name: KarmicScale
4202645d8fa34a97a70ded11ee0f8f31.description: A powerful relic that restores balance and order to the world. Positive and negative become one.
4202645d8fa34a97a70ded11ee0f8f31.effect: Health, damage, and healing become small and even

bab552535a104b059e636abfd7d05685.name: PocketOfHolding
bab552535a104b059e636abfd7d05685.description: A pocket of normal size, but enormous carrying capacity.
bab552535a104b059e636abfd7d05685.effect: Get some temporary bombs each room

4cf72d4585f64a95b4d614bd559e4d58.name: LockPick
4cf72d4585f64a95b4d614bd559e4d58.description: This thief's tool bears the engraving of a rabbit. Also, an engraving that reads "Black Rabbit's, hands off!" Further down it also reads "Seriously!"
4cf72d4585f64a95b4d614bd559e4d58.effect: Open locks for free, but for how long?

5a5b61097a034cfeb6858d2d6c809af0.name: LuckyCharm
5a5b61097a034cfeb6858d2d6c809af0.description: Many have wondered how the street urchin Olivia avoided meeting her end in the Crawl, a dangerous slum of the capital.

52d4e1bd77c84ec790991cf8e87d2ebc.name: LuckyLockpick
52d4e1bd77c84ec790991cf8e87d2ebc.description: "I don't know what you are talking about. This baby never breaks." - Black Rabbit
52d4e1bd77c84ec790991cf8e87d2ebc.effect: A chance to not die, and no chance to break

7b5f646318f3454dacb28fc75eb8c0f2.name: Inverter
7b5f646318f3454dacb28fc75eb8c0f2.description: An ingenious inventor came to the faith late, and made the most of his second life.

82b826e6d3044504bfa46c4caa6f1b0b.name: Recycler
82b826e6d3044504bfa46c4caa6f1b0b.description: Sometimes people hide things in a false bottom. There is only one way to know for sure.

0682d92aff14474d895c2e91f8826f25.name: FanOfKnives
0682d92aff14474d895c2e91f8826f25.description: A devious contraption, invented by a woman who once killed a king. It took the guards an entire hour to figure out what had happened.
0682d92aff14474d895c2e91f8826f25.effect: Release a spray of daggers when you throw

f5e0082e84c74286829fa52bf633cbeb.name: KurtzStache
f5e0082e84c74286829fa52bf633cbeb.description: Before his party was lost, Kurtz had the foresight to stash away some things for safe keeping.
f5e0082e84c74286829fa52bf633cbeb.effect: A mysterious box that invites calamity

b7a8798a25ca4137a95538358085f2f4.name: GlassCannon
b7a8798a25ca4137a95538358085f2f4.description: You can only fire it once. If fired true at its target, another shot will not be necessary.
b7a8798a25ca4137a95538358085f2f4.effect: Increases damage, but decreases maximum health

2e8dd836a09f4e47b57e23b4d00f16ec.name: SoulCannon
2e8dd836a09f4e47b57e23b4d00f16ec.description: A void in space that fires powerful bolts which seem to react to the velocity of attacks.

ecc0480e43924477ad68b3e9beb631b3.name: Ara
ecc0480e43924477ad68b3e9beb631b3.description: Also known as "The Altar." This constellation protects against bad omens, for a while.
ecc0480e43924477ad68b3e9beb631b3.effect: Consumes a future curse after praying

6ca902940c004d7c957fe367f77e7337.name: UrsaMajor
6ca902940c004d7c957fe367f77e7337.description: Consume now, for the winter is long and the landscape desolate.
6ca902940c004d7c957fe367f77e7337.effect: Increases max health after eating food

4ca66dcd2df34cbcbef82e2c5cafd5fc.name: CanisMajor
4ca66dcd2df34cbcbef82e2c5cafd5fc.description: The dogs of dogs. Strong, loyal, and above all else, fierce.

993daf5814304f9da36d0080fe4b9cbc.name: Sagitta
993daf5814304f9da36d0080fe4b9cbc.description: A drawn arrow holds the energy to destroy its target. Guide it.
993daf5814304f9da36d0080fe4b9cbc.effect: Enemies explode in arrows after a critical strike

7aedab48d5ca4e5b8d9f33a292ef38ef.name: Circinus
7aedab48d5ca4e5b8d9f33a292ef38ef.description: An explorer's tool that reveals any and all secrets.
7aedab48d5ca4e5b8d9f33a292ef38ef.effect: Temporarily reveals secret rooms, secret rooms can have secret rooms

24e76c8b632c48f78b0a3060d4d1f786.name: CursedAegis
24e76c8b632c48f78b0a3060d4d1f786.description: The paladin Siegfried sacrificed his soul to Sho'guul for the salvation of his family and thus was forever cursed.

a6587dfd53e54a20ab1a167bc2b40e4a.name: PaladinShield
a6587dfd53e54a20ab1a167bc2b40e4a.description: Siegfried's shield, rid of its agonizing curse. Purified by a nameless wanderer. His legacy redeemed.

5445617cf5a24b678e1680f88ba4f134.name: HotCrossBun
5445617cf5a24b678e1680f88ba4f134.description: "Just like mom used to bake." - Wayland

42ce36751420492584d4a447c129e30c.name: Arachnophobia
42ce36751420492584d4a447c129e30c.description: It is understandable to have a fear of spiders, if after a hard fought battle the reward is more spiders.

a73024497040468a9daf7790a9167b1e.name: SweatyPalms
a73024497040468a9daf7790a9167b1e.description: The first rule of transporting explosives to make sure they are fastened securely.
a73024497040468a9daf7790a9167b1e.effect: Chance to lose a bomb when you take damage

3bf7b541f02f4bbb9c7bafebdb7fd41e.name: SweatyFingers
3bf7b541f02f4bbb9c7bafebdb7fd41e.description: The rest of the hands are dry. It is just the fingers that are sweaty.
3bf7b541f02f4bbb9c7bafebdb7fd41e.effect: Chance to lose a key when you take damage

cef6755dbc2e415e8cdff8cfbe1a4a58.name: PilferNightmare
cef6755dbc2e415e8cdff8cfbe1a4a58.description: Typical Pilfers can be a nuisance, but these... these little edge lords are a nightmare.

4c811aa722884d6ab36404edf9c79eb1.name: Mimephobia
4c811aa722884d6ab36404edf9c79eb1.description: One's mind races and paranoia abounds, but is it paranoia when even the chests are out to get you?
4c811aa722884d6ab36404edf9c79eb1.effect: More mimics than you would like

af4d151c98bc4eb9841767e2e4cd643b.name: RelicEater
af4d151c98bc4eb9841767e2e4cd643b.description: A curse that thirsts for power, but is left unsatisfied when it tastes it.
af4d151c98bc4eb9841767e2e4cd643b.effect: Killing enemies destroys a relicKilling enemies destroys a relic

a6d6119f24ab44b5ac3e292c66b039c3.name: BlessingEater
a6d6119f24ab44b5ac3e292c66b039c3.description: A spiteful curse that hungers for favor.

3cebb72f2cb94342aa1c6c2d455fa8f8.name: ItemEater
3cebb72f2cb94342aa1c6c2d455fa8f8.description: A more mundane curse, settling for the simpler things.

861f2ce31df64b76b15c9e143c60be23.name: Tariffs
861f2ce31df64b76b15c9e143c60be23.description: There is a price for everything, and that price can be increased.

18c02d8c98514cd7b3a6e35683a63462.name: Inflation
18c02d8c98514cd7b3a6e35683a63462.description: The relationship with the Pilfers is tenuous and fickle. Scorn them and suffer the consequences.
18c02d8c98514cd7b3a6e35683a63462.effect: Increases the cost of shop items

f127a5676b15448cb31eef774e4866a3.name: MarketCrash
f127a5676b15448cb31eef774e4866a3.description: A pioneering Noble once attempted to raise the price of potatoes by hoarding them, only for them to rot in his cellar.
f127a5676b15448cb31eef774e4866a3.effect: Increases the cost of shop items

2ee178171a0542c1b0b33c3638bc882b.name: Poverty
2ee178171a0542c1b0b33c3638bc882b.description: "Hasn't anyone told you it costs more to be poor?" - Black Rabbit
2ee178171a0542c1b0b33c3638bc882b.effect: Decrease the amount of gold received

00724b8396b24ddda26cac3b27ca8d41.name: LowStock
00724b8396b24ddda26cac3b27ca8d41.description: Supply chains have been crushed, and the kingdom's river of goods run dry.

5c58a6d3e7184a0c9b5a31ca08a5ee12.name: BloodPact
5c58a6d3e7184a0c9b5a31ca08a5ee12.description: Toil is the act of trading health for something tangible.

c222d9dab4f4499a9ed5f894b172e5f8.name: PowderShortage
c222d9dab4f4499a9ed5f894b172e5f8.description: A generation ago, three sulfur mines ran dry almost simultaneously. Bomb smiths made due, but mining operations slowed down considerably.

f8c5ec2536e648989e3ee6aa6b08b57d.name: RainOfFire
f8c5ec2536e648989e3ee6aa6b08b57d.description: Targon, the Bold was cursed with fire and brimstone after having severed the great Firelord's tail.
f8c5ec2536e648989e3ee6aa6b08b57d.effect: Droplets of fire fall from the sky

3f24c4e8d3254df8b6d13b0cd38acf3f.name: WakingLight
3f24c4e8d3254df8b6d13b0cd38acf3f.description: The lanterns, the torches, and the braziers watch on and they hunt with a fiery vengeance.

4d7cb97a86be4113b6fe61a97550247b.name: SalamandersWrath
4d7cb97a86be4113b6fe61a97550247b.description: The moment Seer's tail was severed the creature set out a roar so fierce that rock shattered and iron was set ablaze.

b578c14ad2b4493a8e8187c46e675f16.name: FastMetabolism
b578c14ad2b4493a8e8187c46e675f16.description: Blessed with a cut jawline and sinewy limbs, but cursed with the inability to maintain a buzz.

9d0586c51fb540aabe6a58e6064aa991.name: Venomous
9d0586c51fb540aabe6a58e6064aa991.description: Now it is not just the spiders and the serpents you must be weary of, for all creatures carry fate in their fangs.

beeaeaf000bf435683c5c5293932c496.name: Plague
beeaeaf000bf435683c5c5293932c496.description: "We knew the food was tainted, but we had no other choice." Survivor of the Lingering Miasma
beeaeaf000bf435683c5c5293932c496.effect: Uncooked food is less effective and has a chance to poison

1533ba9d0d294c1f8c93ed4ae245e9df.name: Tenderfoot
1533ba9d0d294c1f8c93ed4ae245e9df.description: Peasants are issued one pair of boots a year. The boots never last an entire year.

bd9d1797ebd8411aa82ba727cb8a6e94.name: EmptyCoffers
bd9d1797ebd8411aa82ba727cb8a6e94.description: "In my version of the story, the hare wins." - Black Rabbit

32f39a9ff9f54295a3fe7c42e5b2ad5d.name: Rigged
32f39a9ff9f54295a3fe7c42e5b2ad5d.description: "You win some, you lose... a lot? Is that how it goes?" - Black Rabbit

4d5eb4480bdc4ab3b36087fbc9926e69.name: TheCrumbles
4d5eb4480bdc4ab3b36087fbc9926e69.description: Catching a case of the crumbles is clearly a cause for concern!

682d41064792492b9cf351de9bd8a405.name: PoisonMushroom
682d41064792492b9cf351de9bd8a405.description: One makes you larger, and one makes you small.
682d41064792492b9cf351de9bd8a405.effect: Lose maximum health when killing enemies

8138983272d648e9b47995a8c7b5324c.name: HauntedLocks
8138983272d648e9b47995a8c7b5324c.description: Peering through the keyhole reveals a colorful and twisting gateway into another realm.
8138983272d648e9b47995a8c7b5324c.effect: Costs health to use a key

852d2b8abf6446ad81e078472f503b2d.name: Lethargy
852d2b8abf6446ad81e078472f503b2d.description: The heart is willing but the arms are weak and lifeless.

d0cc30fbf196423ea49170a2995e0549.name: Weakness
d0cc30fbf196423ea49170a2995e0549.description: Palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy. There is vomit on the tunic already.

7dc2f7af7fd34fe3b6d5d92f30d20acd.name: Imbalance
7dc2f7af7fd34fe3b6d5d92f30d20acd.description: Every wobbly step, every flinch of the arm worms its way into the brain and feeds a lack of confidence.

0ff4a9c19f294ce4ba489c447ad8df43.name: Wobbly
0ff4a9c19f294ce4ba489c447ad8df43.description: Every wobbly step, every flinch of the arm worms its way into the brain and feeds a lack of confidence.

f4b43b06f1c34576820b596a38dd4a17.name: Mediocrity
f4b43b06f1c34576820b596a38dd4a17.description: Live up to the challenge, or die in mediocrity.

2976adb134a24dd9bce3cdcc1837fc81.name: Frailty
2976adb134a24dd9bce3cdcc1837fc81.description: Complacency can turn that which is tough, hearty, and strong into something as delicate and fragile as an eggshell.

70c32c9d2d394c40bfca62485390363b.name: Enfeebled
70c32c9d2d394c40bfca62485390363b.description: Age catches up with us all.

1e7be481409349c9bfd91d83372ca68b.name: Illness
1e7be481409349c9bfd91d83372ca68b.description: Even the mightiest of kings succumbs to illness.

6d39054e84bf4b909ed76e6112921e4a.name: Fever
6d39054e84bf4b909ed76e6112921e4a.description: Peasants are accustomed to being hot and sweaty, but not like this.

31fa6f68d67349c0a54e1fae385a4b9a.name: Clumsiness
31fa6f68d67349c0a54e1fae385a4b9a.description: It is easy to come between a fool and his gold. It is especially easy when the fool leaves the gold lying around.

e8cff42469714a73b49def4009b3dfd9.name: Ineptitude
e8cff42469714a73b49def4009b3dfd9.description: "Where did I leave my goldsack?" - Unemployed peasant

6e21a8d6949f41a5b91e7f3c15db231a.name: Brittleness
6e21a8d6949f41a5b91e7f3c15db231a.description: A sense of fragility clouds the mind, and it feels as if the lightest of impacts will break the body.

a99c2000ab1b4b6bb2d655e83fa30fca.name: Vulnerable
a99c2000ab1b4b6bb2d655e83fa30fca.description: It's okay to be vurnerable, but not right now.

b3da0dca60f54906a6ea1db94d4b75ef.name: Blisters
b3da0dca60f54906a6ea1db94d4b75ef.description: The wear and tear from constant toil have left the hands bloody, broken, and riddled with pain.

15b3dd56f7074a699c94628b4701ecba.name: JointPain
15b3dd56f7074a699c94628b4701ecba.description: Every miner reaches an age when they consider hanging up their pickaxe.

bbc5177fbd0b491fa5656d64ae532644.name: Arthritis
bbc5177fbd0b491fa5656d64ae532644.description: The pains of time crawl through the bones, slowing the once quick reflexes of youth.

feb2d714e03142aeb48fdde2afc25fd1.name: SpatialSickness
feb2d714e03142aeb48fdde2afc25fd1.description: A curse devised by a bored demon that enjoyed watching his victims throw-up in confusion.

8396a93bb7214647a3dc381a94ca193d.name: BottleBlight
8396a93bb7214647a3dc381a94ca193d.description: An odd affliction that takes issue with bottle substances. Or is it the bottles themselves?
8396a93bb7214647a3dc381a94ca193d.effect: Take damage for each of your potions, each room

905c0ea8343d4feeb7957191761d8338.name: Compulsion
905c0ea8343d4feeb7957191761d8338.description: They say "a healthy life is one of moderation," but they also say "you only live once."
905c0ea8343d4feeb7957191761d8338.effect: All potions automatically drink on pickup

9e441be8838144b285b6e6923f8ba8b8.name: BottleStopper
9e441be8838144b285b6e6923f8ba8b8.description: Derived by a straight-edge wizard that enjoyed ruining everyone's fun.

5a07ac0e26914e5ab472cc79e9a97fe8.name: Mutation
5a07ac0e26914e5ab472cc79e9a97fe8.description: There is a good kind of mutation, and a bad kind. This is the bad kind.

d07217e8683c4309a16192b22cda8add.name: Secrecy
d07217e8683c4309a16192b22cda8add.description: Secrets are only secrets when few people know of them.
d07217e8683c4309a16192b22cda8add.effect: Secret rooms are even more secret

fe4f7657e9a643aab2030836e77fb571.name: SecurityTheater
fe4f7657e9a643aab2030836e77fb571.description: Being secure isn't important. It's the illusion of being secure that matters.
fe4f7657e9a643aab2030836e77fb571.effect: The shop is locked up tight

cbb64a4dc4da4587b3273a50c2a53cc3.name: ExplosiveDecompression
cbb64a4dc4da4587b3273a50c2a53cc3.description: The explosion can be heard by Pilfers for miles.
cbb64a4dc4da4587b3273a50c2a53cc3.effect: All ore is mined when entering a room

bc80dc90e70d46d299f4cb8566a8a777.name: Vertigo
bc80dc90e70d46d299f4cb8566a8a777.description: Staring into the abyss, the mind races, the eyes grow bleary, and the knees weaken.

66435b8332c74c03b06d5039e2962a99.name: Nullification
66435b8332c74c03b06d5039e2962a99.description: A hex used by Aevyn battle mages against invading paladins during the assault of their wooded homeland.

ffc9fe14d44d434a96624680938fd416.name: DarkCloud
ffc9fe14d44d434a96624680938fd416.description: It hangs over the cursed, making the world appear dark and dreary not matter the situation.

4b2977e42e734855acf1e71deefa8e63.name: Uncreative
4b2977e42e734855acf1e71deefa8e63.description: The Djinn rolled his eyes as the fifteenth owner of the lamp wished for more wishes.
4b2977e42e734855acf1e71deefa8e63.effect: Only one blessing is available at altars

56e0afaaf92f45d1ba97f83547bd8b23.name: MaliciousIntent
56e0afaaf92f45d1ba97f83547bd8b23.description: Atonement begins with an earnest look at oneself and one's mistakes.
56e0afaaf92f45d1ba97f83547bd8b23.effect: The cost of Penance is doubled

09d0e4e531c64e7e8e29ba73fb6b7c11.name: BloodiedLocks
09d0e4e531c64e7e8e29ba73fb6b7c11.description: In the catacombs many walls have shallow ruts in the shape of a hand, and dozens of spines facing outwards at the base of those ruts.
09d0e4e531c64e7e8e29ba73fb6b7c11.effect: Lock costs are converted to health

b68c50e2d9584edea52fae690c472ee7.name: BloodOffering
b68c50e2d9584edea52fae690c472ee7.description: The pilfers have grown tired of gold and now demand a greater sacrifice for their wares.
b68c50e2d9584edea52fae690c472ee7.effect: Shop costs are converted to health

d08db904b48e4c2f9a35f8d8fc5dbaab.name: Debt
d08db904b48e4c2f9a35f8d8fc5dbaab.description: Not all debt is bad, but this one certainly is. If only there were a quick way to repay it?

1a2a4e79b6834973b87a62c056b55b1a.name: Chaos
1a2a4e79b6834973b87a62c056b55b1a.description: Item shapes shift and morph like an ephemeral haze. Their form eludes the senses, as if the eyes and ears cannot focus.

186668076c6e4532a6451703d17a83c7.name: Fog
186668076c6e4532a6451703d17a83c7.description: A mist winds its way through the Undermine. It breaths deadly life into the hollow's inhabitants.
186668076c6e4532a6451703d17a83c7.effect: Enemies have double health and damage

6873f352cbeb489eb050bd6fb47a1372.name: Greed
6873f352cbeb489eb050bd6fb47a1372.description: Hot to the touch, as if they were plucked from the oven.
6873f352cbeb489eb050bd6fb47a1372.effect: Take damage when picking up gold

7a78e1580ae34f9c908fc2cb74cc5e81.name: Delight
7a78e1580ae34f9c908fc2cb74cc5e81.description: To truly be deemed a rogue, one must rely on their wits, and their wits alone.

ae2c9f624b104e1b807bb002eeafec9a.name: Torment
ae2c9f624b104e1b807bb002eeafec9a.description: While his shield may be purified, the memory of the nightmare lives on.
ae2c9f624b104e1b807bb002eeafec9a.effect: Adds an indestructible curse on every floor

91517ccfe5f94e0386f4c40fa30938d5.name: Frostbite
91517ccfe5f94e0386f4c40fa30938d5.description: "The bite of cold penetrates the body entirely. A curse? No, this is a nightmare." - Unknown

319cab181142408cae02ade562c5ff14.name: Peril
319cab181142408cae02ade562c5ff14.description: Preparation, training, and fortitude are not enough. One must be a combination of perfect and lucky to avoid catastrophe.

15a5a17ac6824e32aa375755f3119c7c.name: Freedom
15a5a17ac6824e32aa375755f3119c7c.description: "What do you do when the glittery trinkets are taken away, and are left to rely on your skill alone?" - Valeen, the Crone
15a5a17ac6824e32aa375755f3119c7c.effect: Floors no longer have relic rooms

e6e2ae7e3aca49e685346f00c6fb7964.name: Balance
e6e2ae7e3aca49e685346f00c6fb7964.description: A firm stance, and controlled movements do wonders to improve one's throwing capabilities.

b050811163a0484fae8b0cbfd0c3a249.name: Vigor
b050811163a0484fae8b0cbfd0c3a249.description: Brandood, champion pickaxe thrower of the hovels always said it wasn't about size, but a combination of speed and form.

c03f30d5004249e094562277dd286e8a.name: Gust
c03f30d5004249e094562277dd286e8a.description: A tribe in the Storm Hills use a hunting technique that stuns animals with the force radiating from their arrows. Why they intentionally miss the animal is a mystery.

535a312a1fec48b985eb491d5ac20571.name: MightyHurl
535a312a1fec48b985eb491d5ac20571.description: "Some say it's a disadvantage, I say 'there's no problem if you hit your target.'" - Gronk, Champion Pickaxe Thrower

68b9197b9def414dba65f8cbf877aadc.name: Strength
68b9197b9def414dba65f8cbf877aadc.description: Some are blessed with intelligence, but that's not going to help you when staring down a raging Bobo.

db1d12a9bf644b819343cfdda0c9ca6c.name: Exuberance
db1d12a9bf644b819343cfdda0c9ca6c.description: Get pumped up, to pump those arms as fast as you can.

986a533421c64132b8fee6890e1e7cc7.name: Cleave
986a533421c64132b8fee6890e1e7cc7.description: An old prayer, spoken to old gods, grants blades the ability to cut down swaths of men. It works for pickaxes too.

6c6b1f43ea8d43e0ba473b4080c5dac6.name: Savagery
6c6b1f43ea8d43e0ba473b4080c5dac6.description: Channel the lust for blood. Aim it at an enemy. Destroy them entirely.

6a9bf05e698d44e6b99a7b065b67cfc6.name: Ferocity
6a9bf05e698d44e6b99a7b065b67cfc6.description: "Despite all my rage, I'm still just a rat in a cage."

d572e250b86c4d11a512955553be4d9b.name: Demolition
d572e250b86c4d11a512955553be4d9b.description: Be careful what you pray for.

5a4ec614cb1e4e5e8a0aafcd0c0374e7.name: Explosiveness
5a4ec614cb1e4e5e8a0aafcd0c0374e7.description: "Explosive" can mean a lot of things, like being fast on foot, but here it is quite literal.

69fb1736d021409899690bdb5905dddd.name: Fortitude
69fb1736d021409899690bdb5905dddd.description: Peasants develop a strong constitution and thick skin as part of everyday life.

7a431a1136014ef88efe8a530a2716b3.name: Toughness
7a431a1136014ef88efe8a530a2716b3.description: An important attribute for when the raging Bobo barrels over you.

ad0424584fae467c9f89f7a9e4bdf0d7.name: Heartiness
ad0424584fae467c9f89f7a9e4bdf0d7.description: Normally a healthy lifestyle makes for a healthy body, but peasants make due with what they got.

870f3fd76f934065b98fa75d5b237f12.name: SlowMetabolism
870f3fd76f934065b98fa75d5b237f12.description: Slowly burning calories, and maintaining the effects of drinks can only be considered a blessing for a peasant.

49178cd284e948f0b89f0dfb9a2847bb.name: Regeneration
49178cd284e948f0b89f0dfb9a2847bb.description: Curiosity and exploration can rejuvenate the soul.

5ec9f182735e418bb6dcb7f9186cc953.name: Craftsmanship
5ec9f182735e418bb6dcb7f9186cc953.description: A deft hand and some quality string can save you a fortune in the end.

aa7de59e30cd473783df2d2e1879cdde.name: Wealth
aa7de59e30cd473783df2d2e1879cdde.description: The prospector has always understood the true value of the earth.

d182cd977e1f4946b935c5e45acc8bee.name: Loyalty
d182cd977e1f4946b935c5e45acc8bee.description: Pilfers always remember a face, and they enjoy the familiar.
d182cd977e1f4946b935c5e45acc8bee.effect: Reduces the cost of shop items

9c353123e650445aab33a7184a0e75a7.name: HealthSGolden
9c353123e650445aab33a7184a0e75a7.description: Not particularly appetizing, but can buy something that is.

2d660fbac8f74974bb37b2ebb02a305d.name: HealthMGolden
2d660fbac8f74974bb37b2ebb02a305d.description: Fish colored of gold belong in the sea, not in the belly.

5d26fe1e897249d080d4875b0c88fe66.name: HealthLGolden
5d26fe1e897249d080d4875b0c88fe66.description: Not to be confused with a honey baked ham.

038c0066e235445a84153e8c9c450522.name: PeasantJournal
038c0066e235445a84153e8c9c450522.description: A blank journal enchanted by Arkanos. It automatically inscribes everything its bearer senses, so there is no need to put pen to paper. It is passed on to new peasants by the canary along with the goldsack. This way peasants can know what their predecessors witnessed, and maybe not share in their fate.
